data_dictionary.name: KB_A_Definition
data_dictionary.description: [Opioid use disorder is defined as a person continuing to use opioids despite negative consequences.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_B_AnyUse
data_dictionary.description: [Anyone who uses opioids long-term for pain has an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_C_SelfControl
data_dictionary.description: [Most people who develop and/or struggle with an opioid use disorder lack self-control.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_E_QuitAnytime
data_dictionary.description: [A person struggling with an opioid use disorder can choose to quit using at any time if they put their mind to it.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_F_StopBreathing
data_dictionary.description: [Using opioids can slow your breathing or even cause you to stop breathing entirely and lead to an overdose or death.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_Treat_Recover
data_dictionary.description: [Some forms of substance use treatment is effective at helping people recover from an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_H_MedicalCondition
data_dictionary.description: [Opioid use disorder is a medical condition like other chronic health conditions (for example, diabetes, high blood pressure).] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_I_RockBottom
data_dictionary.description: [A person struggling with an opioid use disorder must hit “rock bottom” before they are willing to accept or attend treatment.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_J_EasyFind
data_dictionary.description: [Effective treatment for an opioid use disorder is easy to find.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_MedicationsExist
data_dictionary.description: [Approved medications that are effective in treating opioid use disorder exist.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_L_JailHelps
data_dictionary.description: [Jailing someone with an opioid use disorder for at least a few days will help them by reducing their risk for an overdose.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_SeekProfessional
data_dictionary.description: [People with an opioid use disorder should seek professional help.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_LongTerm
data_dictionary.description: [People with an opioid use disorder require long-term treatment in order to recover.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_Medications_Recover
data_dictionary.description: [People with an opioid use disorder need medications in order to recover.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_Recovery_No_End
data_dictionary.description: [Recovery is a continuous process that never ends.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: KB_PainMeds_Dangerous
data_dictionary.description: [Individuals with an opioid use disorder specific to prescription pain medications are more dangerous.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Heroin_SeekTreatment
data_dictionary.description: [Individuals with an opioid use disorder specific to heroin are more likely to seek treatment.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Heroin_Recover
data_dictionary.description: [Individuals with an opioid use disorder specific to heroin are more likely to recover.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Heroin_MoreTreatment
data_dictionary.description: [Individuals with an opioid use disorder specific to heroin will require more treatment in their attempt at recovery.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Family_Know_Treatment
data_dictionary.description: [I would want my friends and family to know if I sought treatment for an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Friend_Tell_Treatment
data_dictionary.description: [I would want my friend to tell me if they sought treatment for an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Encourage_Friend_Treatment
data_dictionary.description: [I would encourage my friend to seek treatment if they had an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Treatment_Separate_Healthcare
data_dictionary.description: [Treatment for opioid use disorder should be delivered separately from general health care services.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: GeneralHCP_Treatment
data_dictionary.description: [General health care providers should not be responsible for treating individuals with an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: GeneralHCP_Trained
data_dictionary.description: [General health care providers should be required to receive training on treatment for opioid use disorders.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: GeneralHCP_NoTreat
data_dictionary.description: [I would not want my general health care provider to treat individuals with an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Opinion_Changed
data_dictionary.description: [My opinions about opioid use disorder have changed over the last 5 years.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: At_Risk
data_dictionary.description: […I think I would be considered “at risk” for developing an opioid use disorder.] Do you disagree or agree with the following statements about opioid use disorder?

data_dictionary.name: Personal_COVIDtest
data_dictionary.description: Have you been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)? If so, what was the result?

encodings.1: I have been tested and I tested positive (I had coronavirus)
encodings.2: I have been tested and I tested negative (I did not have coronavirus)
encodings.3: I have been tested and I do not know the result

data_dictionary.name: Household_COVIDtest
data_dictionary.description: Has anyone else in your household (not counting yourself) been tested for COVID-19 (coronavirus)?

encodings.1: They have been tested and they tested positive (They had coronavirus)
encodings.2: They have been tested and they tested negative (They did not have coronavirus)
encodings.3: They have been tested and they do not know the result
encodings.6: There is no one else living in my household
